t: About Liverpool Jeans – LIVERPOOL LOS ANGELES
s: Founded in 2012 by Jill and Ron Perilman, Liverpool was born out of a commitment to create superior fitting, on-trend, premium quality sportswear at a better value than any competitor out there. That commitment has never wavered. Ron brought 35+ years of experience building successful denim and casual sportswear brands.
